entry.title: $250 E-Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: GC250
Type: Gift Card
Price: 250.00

Our $250 BagsinBulk Gift Card is perfect for helping out your non-profit organization or local charity event. Multiple gift cards can be used to make a large purchase and can be redeemed directly online or over the phone. Once gift card is purchase you will receive an email with your E-Gift Card. 

  • BagsinBulk Gift Cards never expire and carry no fees.
  • Redeemable towards any item listed on Bagsinbulk.com
  • No returns and no refunds on Gift Cards.
